ygData.subject: RE: Special foraged foods
ygData.msgSnippet: I have foraged several backpacks full of berries, etc for baking and have never gotten a single special forage.  I have probably successfully foraged at least
ygData.messageBody:
I have foraged several backpacks full of berries, etc for baking and have
never gotten a single special forage. I have probably successfully foraged
at least 200 items since they were added with no luck. My friend who is a
level 15 ranger has gotten 2 so far with a forage of 75+.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Christine [mailto:christine@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 09, 1999 11:31 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Special foraged foods


From: "Christine" <christine@...>

I believe there is a skill-check involved in foraging the new special food
(like crocodile eggs, mushrooms, sea salt, sylvian berries, glowing lich,
etc), but I'm trying to figure out what it is.

So I have a few questions:

1. Bards max at 40 foraging, right?
2. At what level do you usually reach 40 skill foraging?
3. Have any of you bards managed to forage something other than berries,
fruit, rabbit meat, roots, veggies and water? And at what skill level did
you get it?

Anyone know about druids? (Like, if you have a druid, what is his skill cap
and has he found any of the items, etc)

Thanks!

Daleia

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
